content: Sprechen Sie Deutsch? SEO Events By: Rand Fishkin January 3, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin January 3, 2006 Sprechen Sie Deutsch? SEO Events The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Thomas Bindl threatened me with obscurity if I didn't note his new forum - OMTalk (brilliant name, BTW). Sadly, my German's all gone (I used to speak enough to get by, but now I only remember the words to 99 Luftballoons), but I have no doubt that he'll soon be competing with Germany's other top SEO/Web Marketing forum, Abakus... Congrats, Thomas - best of luck corralling those unruly German SEOs! Also, someone should seriously consider getting a new word for SEO in German - "Suchmaschinenoptimierung" is ludicrously hard to type, never mind pronounce. Copied! Back to Top
